str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Blind, physically or mentally. From, tuphoo; opaque, i.e. blind.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To look up, recover my sight. From ana and blepo; to look up; by implication, to recover sight.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From phone; to emit a sound; by implication, to address in words or by name, also in imitation.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To look up, recover my sight. From ana and blepo; to look up; by implication, to recover sight.
A begetter, father; plur: parents. From the base of ginomai; a parent.
